name: Dodge the Creeps (Godot Engine Tutorial game)
name_original: Dodge the Creeps (Godot Engine Tutorial game)
description:
The idea of this project is to better understand how to upload a game to the itch.io server. The project is "playable", but it is obviously quite simple. I hope you can spend some time with this game hahaha

Feel free to comment! If you have any ideias for this, I will be glad to listen =)
